page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area 03640795 is just west of{ {BANCHORY}in the{River Dee}valley, the river running through it from west to east. The steep, north_facing slope in the southern third of the area is covered in{coniferous trees}planted by the{ {Forestry Commission.} There are few buildings on this shady side of the valley. North of the river the hilly land rises to approx. 150m. The lower land and gentle slopes are farmland; the rest a mixture of coniferous woodland with braken, heather and to approx 150m. The lower land and gentle slopes are farmland, the rest a mixture of heather, braken and rough grassland under it. The hilltops are moorland.
